update base_product
sys_code = #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, split_textures_info = #{splitTexturesInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, material_file_id = #{materialFileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spaceComon_id = #{spaceComonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pro_style_id = #{proStyleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_spec = #{productSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color_id = #{colorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_length = #{productLength,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_width = #{productWidth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_height = #{productHeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pic_id = #{picId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_desc = #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_ids = #{picIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_pic_ids = #{materialPicIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material3d_pic_ids = #{material3dPicIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_type_values = #{houseTypeValues,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_type_value = #{productTypeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_type_mark = #{productTypeMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_small_type_mark = #{productSmallTypeMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
SELECT pc.id, pc.pid, pc.name, pc.level, pc.long_code, pc.code, pc.pic_path FROM pro_category pc
LEFT JOIN company_category_rel cc ON pc.id = cc.category_id and cc.is_deleted = 0
where
cc.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
pc.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY pc.ordering ASC
SELECT * from pro_category WHERE pid = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT * from pro_category WHERE long_code like
CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%','or',)
AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT bp.id AS product_id, bb.brand_name, bp.product_name, ppr.description as productDesc, bp.product_spec, bp.product_type_value, ppr.style_id as product_style_id_info, ppr.pic_ids, ppr.sale_price, bp.split_textures_info, bp.product_model_number, bp.brand_id, sd.name productColorName, ps.style_name productStyleName, bb.company_id FROM base_product bp
LEFT JOIN platform2c_product_rel AS ppr ON ppr.product_id = bp.id
LEFT JOIN platform2b_product_rel AS ppr ON ppr.product_id = bp.id
LEFT JOIN base_brand bb ON bp.brand_id = bb.id and bb.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd ON sd.type = "productColor" and sd.value = bp.color_id LEFT JOIN product_style ps ON ps.id = bp.style_id and ps.is_deleted = 0 WHERE bp.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ppr.platform_id = #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ppr.putaway_state = 1 AND ppr.allot_state = 1 AND bp.is_deleted = 0 AND bp.putaway_state = 3
SELECT company_main_category from base_company WHERE id = #{conpanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT * from base_product WHERE parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT pc.id, pc.pid, pc.name, pc.level, pc.long_code, pc.code FROM pro_category pc WHERE pc.pid IN ( SELECT id FROM pro_category WHERE pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) OR pc.pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND pc.is_deleted = 0
select fix_transport_expense from base_spu_pk where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select sale_price from platform2c_product_rel where product_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and platform_id = 14
